fi.tamk.cgeng.tiles

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.cgeng.tiles.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Tile represents single tile on the tilemap. has texture, id and info about if its solid tile or not(Can you move through the tile).
